title: Create Notification Preferences Component
description: Develop UI component for managing notification preferences with form validation

user_stories: As a user, I want to manage my notification preferences so that I only receive relevant alerts
As a user, I want to customize notification settings so that I can control my experience
business_rules: Notification preferences form must validate all required fields
Notification preferences must be saved and applied correctly
Notification preferences must follow the design system
Notification preferences must handle validation errors and success messages
edge_cases: Managing form validation errors for preferences
Handling preferences with different notification types

acceptance_criteria: Notification preferences form validates all required fields and displays errors
Notification preferences form allows editing of appropriate fields
Notification preferences follow the design system
Notification preferences handle validation errors and success messages properly
Notification preferences integrate with Notification Management API endpoints

integration_tests: Notification preferences integration with backend APIs
Form submission and validation with API responses

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement notification preferences component following Angular best practices for form handling. Ensure proper validation and error handling. Implement preference update functionality.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for notification preference operations. Implement appropriate validation for preference input. Protect sensitive preference information during form submission.
